aws_services: ECS Fargate, Application Load Balancer, RDS Aurora PostgreSQL, ECR, VPC, CloudWatch, CloudWatch Logs, Auto Scaling, IAM, Security Groups, Target Groups, Route 53, NAT Gateway, Internet Gateway, Subnets
validation_issues: CRITICAL: PROMPT.md describes Python implementation but actual code is TypeScript - complete platform/language mismatch
CRITICAL: PROMPT.md uses AI-generated format with XML-style tags instead of human conversational style
CRITICAL: IDEAL_RESPONSE.md has improperly formatted code blocks and missing complete implementation
CRITICAL: PROMPT.md describes multi-tenant SaaS application, but actual implementation is trading analytics platform
HIGH: MODEL_RESPONSE.md contains Python code that does not match TypeScript implementation
author: raghav-turing
